instagramAccount.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 12; SM-G991B) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/120.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
instagramAccount.notes: Put your Instagram cookies in account.txt. Required cookies: sessionid, ds_user_id, csrftoken

notesLanguage: change to your language with ISO 639-1 code, available languages: vi (Vietnamese), en (English)

whiteListMode.notes: if you enable this feature, only the ids in the whiteListIds section can use the bot

database.notes: Using JSON database for simplicity. For MongoDB, add connection URI.

autoRestart.notes: Set time in milliseconds or cron format for auto restart

autoUptime.notes: Auto uptime ping interval in seconds
